_header: This holy time make thou clean
Subjects: evils of the times; confession, exhortation to
_description: ‘With god of loue & pes ȝe trete’ — twenty-four eight-line stanzas with this refrain

BodDig102.First Lines:
This holy tyme make ȝow cleneBurnysche bryȝt ȝoure
                    soules blake…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…God brynge ȝow to his angels sauȝtþere neuere
                    nys nede o pes to trete
BodDig102.Attributed Title: With god of loue & pes ȝe trete (f. 106v)
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 34-40.
